name: Gem Hunters
description:
Match lines of elemental gems and unleash powerful spells in this addictive puzzle/RPG adventure. Guide your hero through 7 exciting and magical worlds on a quest to find your long lost treasure!

* Choose from three heroic character classes!
* Puzzle gameplay meets RPG battles!
* Procedurally generated items and loot!
* Over 80 spells to collect!
* Battle for glory against other heroes in the Arena!
* A fun and engaging storyline!
